 @param _address the address to check the edit status of

devdoc.author: Olly W.
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

params._address: the address to log in the event

params._content: the actual content of the code snippet
params._lang: the language of the code snippet
params._name: the name of the code snippet

params._length: new length in bytes for the maxSnippetLength

params._address: the address associated with the snippet to change
params._content: the new content for this snippet
params._lang: the new lang for this snippet

params._address: the address associated with the snippet to change
params._status: the new public_edit status for the snippet

params._address: the address associated with the snippet to retrieve

returns.address_snippet: - the address associated with the snippet
returns.content: - the actual content of the relevant snippet
returns.lang: - the lang (e.g., javascript) of the relevant snippet
returns.name: - the name of the relevant snippet
returns.public_edit: - whether or not this snippet can be publicly edited

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

maxSnippetLength.details: The maximum length of a code snippet

devdoc.title: A web 3.0 code snippet paster contract

LogSender(address).notice: An event to log the address sent in a call

addPasteSnippet(string,string,string).notice: A function to add a new PasteSnippet, or change the PasteSnippet at a specific address

changeMaxSnippetLength(uint256).notice: Function to change the maximum length (in bytes) of a code snippet, may only be called by the contract owner

changePasteSnippetContent(address,string.notice: A function to change only the content and lang of a PasteSnippet at a specific address

changePasteSnippetPublicEdit(address,boo.notice: A function to change only the publicly editable status of a PasteSnippet at a specific address

getPasteSnippet(address).notice: A function to get the information of a specific snippet at a specific address

initialize().notice: contract initialization function, sets maxSnippetLength to 1024 bytes

paste_snippets(address).notice: Returns the PasteSnippet at a specific address in the mapping
